alert.note: Alert for Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 3:38PM CDT until May 05 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Northern Stone County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 337 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Macedonia to 4 miles south of Sunrise to Purvis to 5 miles north of Lumberton, moving southeast at 40 mph. This line has had a history of producing damaging winds with numerous trees being reported down across Lamar County Mississippi. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wiggins, Richton, Beaumont and New Augusta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
